babble.net.json

Class JSONServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • babble.net.NioServer<JSONRequest,JSONResponse>
      • babble.net.json.JSONServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class JSONServer
extends NioServer<JSONRequest,JSONResponse>
    A server using TCP/IP as transport and JSON-RPC as application protocol. The transport protocol is provided by the base class.
    The JSON-RPC protocol is provided by a combination of JSONRouter, JSONRequest and JSONResponse.
    This server is intended to be embedded, though it can also be run as a standalone application. To embed in a larger application, 
      public class MyApplication {
  
    public static void main(String[] args) {
       JSONServer server = new JSONServer("my JSON-RPC server", 8080);
       
       server.addRoute(new JSONRoute());
       
       server.start();
    }
  }
    Author:
    pinaki poddar

        public JSONResponse newResponse(JSONRequest request)

      • getURL

        public String getURL()
        Description copied from class: NioServer
        gets a URL to reach this server. The URL at this network level server specify [protocol://]host:port where protocol is supplied by the router, if it is attached.
        Overrides:
        getURL in class NioServer<JSONRequest,JSONResponse>
        Returns:
